verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass in those <S%H1992><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> when there was no <S%H369><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that there was a certain <S%H376><s%> Levite <S%H3881><s%> sojourning <S%H1481><s%> on the side <S%H3411><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> who took <S%H3947><s%> to him a concubine <S%H6370><s%> out of Bethlehemjudah. <S%H1035><s%>

And his concubine <S%H6370><s%> played the whore <S%H2181><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him, and went <S%H3212><s%> away from him to her father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> to Bethlehemjudah, <S%H1035><s%> and was there <S%H8033><s%> four <S%H702><s%> whole <S%H3117><s%> months. <S%H2320><s%>

And her husband <S%H376><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> her, to speak <S%H1696><s%> friendly <S%H3820><s%> to her, and to bring <S%H7725><s%> her again, <S%H7725><s%> having his servant <S%H5288><s%> with him, and a couple <S%H6776><s%> of asses: <S%H2543><s%> and she brought <S%H935><s%> him into her father's <S%H1><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%> and when the father <S%H1><s%> of the damsel <S%H5291><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> him, he rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him.

And his father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father, <S%H1><s%> retained <S%H2388><s%> him; and he stayed <S%H3427><s%> with him three <S%H7969><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> so they did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink, <S%H8354><s%> and lodged <S%H3885><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass on the fourth <S%H7243><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> when they arose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> that he rose <S%H6965><s%> up to depart: <S%H3212><s%> and the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his son <S%H2860><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> Comfort <S%H5582><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> with a morsel <S%H6595><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> your way.

And they sat <S%H3427><s%> down, and did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them together: <S%H3162><s%> for the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father <S%H1><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> to the man, <S%H376><s%> Be content, <S%H2974><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, and tarry <S%H3885><s%> all <S%H3885><s%> night, and let your heart <S%H3820><s%> be merry. <S%H3190><s%>

And when the man <S%H376><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up to depart, <S%H3212><s%> his father <S%H2859><s%> in law <S%H2859><s%> urged <S%H6484><s%> him: therefore he lodged <S%H3885><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%>

And he arose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> on the fifth <S%H2549><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> to depart; <S%H3212><s%> and the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father <S%H1><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Comfort <S%H5582><s%> your heart, <S%H3824><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you. And they tarried <S%H4102><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> afternoon, <S%H5186><s%> <S%H3117><s%> and they did eat <S%H398><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them.

And when the man <S%H376><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up to depart, <S%H3212><s%> he, and his concubine, <S%H6370><s%> and his servant, <S%H5288><s%> his father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father, <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> draws <S%H7503><s%> toward evening, <S%H6150><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you tarry <S%H3885><s%> all <S%H3885><s%> night: behold, <S%H2009><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> grows <S%H2583><s%> to an end, <S%H2583><s%> lodge <S%H3885><s%> here, <S%H6311><s%> that your heart <S%H3824><s%> may be merry; <S%H3190><s%> and to morrow <S%H4279><s%> get you early <S%H7925><s%> on your way, <S%H1870><s%> that you may go <S%H1980><s%> home. <S%H168><s%>

But the man <S%H376><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not tarry <S%H3885><s%> that night, but he rose <S%H6965><s%> up and departed, <S%H3212><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> over <S%H5227><s%> against <S%H5227><s%> Jebus, <S%H2982><s%> which <S%H1958><s%> is Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and there were with him two <S%H6776><s%> asses <S%H2543><s%> saddled, <S%H2280><s%> his concubine <S%H6370><s%> also was with him.

And when they were by Jebus, <S%H2982><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> was far <S%H3966><s%> spent; <S%H7286><s%> and the servant <S%H5288><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his master, <S%H113><s%> Come, <S%H3212><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, and let us turn <S%H5493><s%> in into <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> of the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> and lodge <S%H3885><s%> in it.

And his master <S%H113><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, We will not turn <S%H5493><s%> aside here into <S%H413><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of a stranger, <S%H5237><s%> that is not of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> we will pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to Gibeah. <S%H1390><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to his servant, <S%H5288><s%> Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us draw near <S%H7126><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of these places <S%H4725><s%> to lodge <S%H3885><s%> all <S%H3885><s%> night, in Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in Ramah. <S%H7414><s%>

And they passed <S%H5674><s%> on and went <S%H3212><s%> their way; <S%H3212><s%> and the sun <S%H8121><s%> went <S%H935><s%> down on them when they were by Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> which <S%H834><s%> belongs to Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>

And they turned <S%H5493><s%> aside thither, <S%H8033><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> in and to lodge <S%H3885><s%> in Gibeah: <S%H1390><s%> and when he went <S%H935><s%> in, he sat <S%H3427><s%> him down in a street <S%H7339><s%> of the city: <S%H5892><s%> for there was no <S%H369><s%> man <S%H376><s%> that took <S%H622><s%> them into his house <S%H1004><s%> to lodging. <S%H3885><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came <S%H935><s%> an old <S%H2205><s%> man <S%H376><s%> from his work <S%H4639><s%> out of the field <S%H7704><s%> at even, <S%H6153><s%> which was also of mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> and he sojourned <S%H1481><s%> in Gibeah: <S%H1390><s%> but the men <S%H582><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> were Benjamites. <S%H1145><s%>

And when he had lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> he saw <S%H7200><s%> a wayfaring <S%H732><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in the street <S%H7339><s%> of the city: <S%H5892><s%> and the old <S%H2205><s%> man <S%H376><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Where <S%H575><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> you? and from where <S%H370><s%> come <S%H935><s%> you?

And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, We are passing <S%H5674><s%> from Bethlehemjudah <S%H1035><s%> toward <S%H5704><s%> the side <S%H3411><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> am I: and I went <S%H3212><s%> to Bethlehemjudah, <S%H1035><s%> but I am now going <S%H1980><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and there is no <S%H369><s%> man <S%H376><s%> that receives <S%H622><s%> me to house. <S%H1004><s%>

Yet <S%H1571><s%> there is both <S%H1571><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> and provender <S%H4554><s%> for our asses; <S%H2543><s%> and there is bread <S%H3899><s%> and wine <S%H3196><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> for me, and for your handmaid, <S%H519><s%> and for the young <S%H5288><s%> man which is with your servants: <S%H5650><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> want <S%H4270><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> thing. <S%H1697><s%>

And the old <S%H2205><s%> man <S%H376><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Peace <S%H7965><s%> be with you; howsoever <S%H7535><s%> let all <S%H3605><s%> your wants <S%H4270><s%> lie on me; only <S%H7535><s%> lodge <S%H3885><s%> not in the street. <S%H7339><s%>

So he brought <S%H935><s%> him into his house, <S%H1004><s%> and gave provender <S%H1101><s%> to the asses: <S%H2543><s%> and they washed <S%H7364><s%> their feet, <S%H7272><s%> and did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink. <S%H8354><s%>

Now as they were making their hearts <S%H3820><s%> merry, <S%H3190><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> certain <S%H582><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Belial, <S%H1100><s%> beset <S%H5437><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> round <S%H5437><s%> about, and beat <S%H1849><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the door, <S%H1817><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to the master <S%H1167><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> the old <S%H2205><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> your house, <S%H1004><s%> that we may know <S%H3045><s%> him.

And the man, <S%H376><s%> the master <S%H1167><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to them, and said <S%H559><s%> to them, No, <S%H408><s%> my brothers, <S%H251><s%> no, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, do not so wickedly; <S%H7489><s%> seeing <S%H310><s%> that this <S%H2088><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> my house, <S%H1004><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> not this <S%H2063><s%> folly. <S%H5039><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> here is my daughter <S%H1323><s%> a maiden, <S%H1330><s%> and his concubine; <S%H6370><s%> them I will bring <S%H3318><s%> out now, <S%H4994><s%> and humble <S%H6031><s%> you them, and do <S%H6213><s%> with them what seems <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> to you: but to this <S%H2088><s%> man <S%H376><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> not so <S%H2063><s%> vile <S%H5039><s%> a thing. <S%H1697><s%>

But the men <S%H582><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not listen <S%H8085><s%> to him: so the man <S%H376><s%> took <S%H2388><s%> his concubine, <S%H6370><s%> and brought <S%H3318><s%> her forth <S%H3318><s%> to them; and they knew <S%H3045><s%> her, and abused <S%H5953><s%> her all <S%H3605><s%> the night <S%H3915><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the morning: <S%H1242><s%> and when the day <S%H7837><s%> began to spring, <S%H5927><s%> they let her go. <S%H7971><s%>

Then came <S%H935><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> in the dawning <S%H6437><s%> of the day, <S%H1242><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> down at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the man's <S%H376><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> her lord <S%H113><s%> was, till <S%H5704><s%> it was light. <S%H216><s%>

And her lord <S%H113><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and opened <S%H6605><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> out to go <S%H3212><s%> his way: <S%H1870><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> his concubine <S%H6370><s%> was fallen <S%H5307><s%> down at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> and her hands <S%H3027><s%> were on the threshold. <S%H5592><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to her, Up, and let us be going. <S%H3212><s%> But none <S%H369><s%> answered. <S%H6030><s%> Then the man <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> her up on an ass, <S%H2543><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up, and got <S%H3212><s%> him to his place. <S%H4725><s%>

And when he was come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> his house, <S%H1004><s%> he took <S%H3947><s%> a knife, <S%H3979><s%> and laid hold <S%H2388><s%> on his concubine, <S%H6370><s%> and divided <S%H5408><s%> her, together with her bones, <S%H6106><s%> into twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> pieces, <S%H5409><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> her into all <S%H3605><s%> the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it was so, that all <S%H3605><s%> that saw <S%H7200><s%> it said, <S%H559><s%> There was no <S%H3808><s%> such <S%H2063><s%> deed done <S%H1961><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> consider <S%H7760><s%> of it, take advice, <S%H5779><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> your minds.
